sourcesContent:
<script setup>

</script>

<template>
  <input v-model="newTaskDescription" placeholder="Enter a description"/>
  <button @click="addTask">Add Task (enter description)</button>

</template>

<script>
import api from "@/services/api";

export default {
  name: 'AddTask',
  data() {
    return {
      newTaskDescription:"",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    async addTask() {
      if (!this.newTaskDescription.trim()) {
        return;
      }

      try {
        // Envoyer directement la string, pas un objet
        const response = await api.addTask(this.newTaskDescription);
        console.log('Tâche ajoutée:', response.data);
        this.newTaskDescription = "";
        this.$emit("task-added");
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Erreur lors de l\'ajout de la tâche :', error);
        console.error('Détails:', error.response?.data);
      }
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
